飛: to kick away, to kick off, to kick (someone), to refuse, to reject
文: document, writing, letter, note, records, archives
高: quantity, amount, volume, number, amount of money
to rise, to swell, to be promoted
冫: to banter, to make fun of, to jeer at, to cool, to refrigerate
冂: playback, regeneration, resuscitation, return to life, rebirth, reincarnation, narrow escape, reclamation, r
廴: face, official stance, public position or attitude (as opposed to private thoughts)
not only...but also, in addition to, consequently
支: to interfere, to hinder, to become impeded
爻: fresh, refreshing, invigorating, clear, fluent, eloquent
厶: elimination, erasing, dying out, melting away
舛: to finish, to close, to do something completely, to put away, to put an end to
to dance, to flutter about, to revolve
enquiry, expression of sympathy, expression of concern
丨: centre, pivot, mainstay, nucleus, backbone, central figure, pillar, key man
卜: occupation, capture, possession, have a room to oneself
非: by all means (with sense of not taking no for an answer)
臣: to look out on, to face, to deal with, to attend (function)
